wikipedia_page.main: Dheeraj Gopichand Hinduja (born August 1971) is a british-Indian businessman, the chairman of Ashok Leyland since October 2010.

response: He is married to Sunita Hinduja, and they have two sons and one daughter, Sanjay Hinduja, Dheeraj Hinduja and Rita Hinduja. The Hinduja family is of Sindhi heritage.
*Dheeraj Hinduja, businessman and chairman of Ashok Leyland
